Export.CSP:
<?xml encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- ====================================================================== --> <!-- Arbortext DocBook XML V4.0 DTD Copyright (C) 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001 Arbortext, Inc.
Common declaration:
<?xml version=1.0?> <!DOCTYPE set PUBLIC "-//Arbortext//DTD DocBook XML V4.0//EN" "axdocbook.dtd">
--> <!-- ====================================================================== -->
<!-- ...................................................................... --> <!-- Arbortext customizations.............................................. -->
<!ENTITY % sgml-entity-declarations "IGNORE"> <![%sgml-entity-declarations;[ <!ENTITY % xml-entity-declarations "IGNORE"> ]]> <!ENTITY % xml-entity-declarations "INCLUDE">
<!ENTITY % atimath PUBLIC "-//Arbortext//ELEMENTS XML Math Equation Structures//EN" "../../entities/atimathx.dtd"> %atimath;
<!ENTITY % equation.content "(graphic|fd+)">
<!ENTITY % inlineequation.content "(graphic|f+)">
<!-- ...................................................................... --> <!-- Notation declarations ................................................ -->
<!ENTITY % dbnotn.module "INCLUDE"> <![%dbnotn.module;[ <!ENTITY % dbnotn PUBLIC "-//Arbortext//ENTITIES DocBook XML Notations V4.0//EN" "dbnotnx.mod"> %dbnotn; ]]>
<!-- ...................................................................... --> <!-- ISO character entity sets ............................................ -->
<!ENTITY % dbcent.module "INCLUDE"> <![%dbcent.module;[ <!ENTITY % dbcent PUBLIC "-//Arbortext//ENTITIES DocBook XML Character Entities V4.0//EN" "dbcentx.mod"> %dbcent; ]]>
<!-- ...................................................................... --> <!-- DTD modules .......................................................... -->
<!-- Information pool .............. -->
<!ENTITY % dbpool PUBLIC "-//Arbortext//ELEMENTS DocBook XML Information Pool V4.0//EN" "dbpoolx.mod"> %dbpool;
<!-- Redeclaration placeholder ..... -->
<!ENTITY % intermod.redecl.module "IGNORE"> <![%intermod.redecl.module;[ <!-- Defining rdbmods here makes some buggy XML parsers happy. --> <!ENTITY % rdbmods ""> %rdbmods; <!--end of intermod.redecl.module-->]]>
<!-- Document hierarchy ............ -->
<!ENTITY % dbhier PUBLIC "-//Arbortext//ELEMENTS DocBook XML Document Hierarchy V4.0//EN" "dbhierx.mod"> %dbhier; <!-- ...................................................................... --> <!-- Other general entities ............................................... -->
<!ENTITY % dbgenent PUBLIC "-//Arbortext//ENTITIES DocBook XML Additional General Entities V4.0//EN" "dbgenent.ent"> %dbgenent;
<!-- End of Arbortext DocBook XML V4.0 DTD .................................. --> <!-- ...................................................................... -->
